item.title: GLXY Stock Rises On Galaxy Digital’s $200M Share Repurchase Program
item.description: The announcement comes days after Galaxy Digital reported its fourth-quarter results, missing Wall Street expectations.

item.title: China Tightens Its Grip On Crypto, Bars Firms From Issuing Tokens Overseas Without Permit: Reports
item.description: Chinese officials have reportedly warned that tokenizing real-world assets and related services could constitute illegal fundraising.

item.title: Global Semiconductor Sales Poised To Hit $1 Trillion In 2026 As AI Fuels Demand

item.title: El-Erian Says Recent Fed Messaging Has Come Across As 'Confused', Agrees That A Kevin Warsh-Led Central Bank Would Say A Lot Less
item.description: The economist cited a recent Politico newsletter stating that, as Fed Chair, Kevin Warsh could bring a shift in the central bank’s communication.
